Name: Sachin Tendulkar
Teams: India, Asia XI, Mumbai, Mumbai Indians, Marylebone Cricket Club, Sachin Blasters, India Legends
Bio: Sachin Tendulkar has been the most complete batsman of his time,the most prolific runmaker of all time,arguably the biggest cricket icon the game has ever known,His batting was based on the purest principles: perfect balance,precision in stroke-making,that intangible quality given only to geniuses - anticipation,If he didn't have a signature stroke - the upright,back-foot punch comes close - it's because he was equally proficient at each of the full range of orthodox shots  plenty of improvised ones as well  can pull them out at will
